HEADLINE: The Company informs the Exchange about the audio of earnings investor call uploaded on the official website of the Company.
The Company intimates the Exchange about the Earnings call recording available on their website as per Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations.

In Continuation to our letter dated 10th November 2022 the Company organized a conference call with the Investors/ Analysts on Saturday, 12th November 2022 at 10:00 am (IST). A copy of the Transcript of the conference call held with the Investors/ Analysts is enclosed herewith and the same has also been uploaded on the Company''s Website

the audio recording of the earnings call and earnings presentation made on November 11, 2022, on Unaudited Financial Results (Consolidated and Standalone) of the Company for the Quarter and Half Year ended September 30, 2022, is available on the Company's website at https://www.kimshospitals.com/investors > Disclosures under Regulation 46 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 > Analysts Calls schedule, PPT & Transcripts > Transcripts, Audio & Video Recordings > FY 22-23
